verses.verse: And the Philistines <WH6430> took <WH3947> <WH8804> the ark <WH727> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> it from Ebenezer <WH72> unto Ashdod <WH795>.

When the Philistines <WH6430> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the ark <WH727> of 'Elohim <WH430>, they brought <WH935> <WH8686> it into the house <WH1004> of Dagon <WH1712>, and set <WH3322> <WH8686> it by <WH681> Dagon <WH1712>.

And when they of Ashdod <WH796> arose early <WH7925> <WH8686> on the morrow <WH4283>, behold, Dagon <WH1712> was fallen <WH5307> <WH8802> upon his face <WH6440> to the earth <WH776> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>. And they took <WH3947> <WH8799> Dagon <WH1712>, and set <WH7725> him in his place <WH4725> again <WH7725> <WH8686>.

And when they arose early <WH7925> <WH8686> on the morrow <WH4283> morning <WH1242>, behold, Dagon <WH1712> was fallen <WH5307> <WH8802> upon his face <WH6440> to the ground <WH776> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>; and the head <WH7218> of Dagon <WH1712> and both <WH8147> the palms <WH3709> of his hands <WH3027> were cut off <WH3772> <WH8803> upon the threshold <WH4670>; only the stump of Dagon <WH1712> was left <WH7604> <WH8738> to him.

Therefore neither the Kohanim <WH3548> of Dagon <WH1712>, nor any that come <WH935> <WH8802> into Dagon's <WH1712> house <WH1004>, tread <WH1869> <WH8799> on the threshold <WH4670> of Dagon <WH1712> in Ashdod <WH795> unto this day <WH3117>.

But the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> was heavy <WH3513> <WH8799> upon them of Ashdod <WH796>, and he destroyed <WH8074> <WH8686> them, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them with emerods <WH2914> <WH8675> <WH6076>, even Ashdod <WH795> and the coasts <WH1366> thereof.

And when the men <WH582> of Ashdod <WH795> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that it was so, they said <WH559> <WH8804>, The ark <WH727> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall not abide <WH3427> <WH8799> with us: for his hand <WH3027> is sore <WH7185> <WH8804> upon us, and upon Dagon <WH1712> our god <WH430>.

They sent <WH7971> <WH8799> therefore and gathered <WH622> <WH8799> all the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> unto them, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, What shall we do <WH6213> <WH8799> with the ark <WH727> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>? And they answered <WH559> <WH8799>, Let the ark <WH727> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> be carried about <WH5437> <WH8735> unto Gat <WH1661>. And they carried <WH5437> the ark <WH727> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> about <WH5437> <WH8686> thither.

And it was so, that, after <WH310> they had carried it about <WH5437> <WH8689>, the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> was against the city <WH5892> with a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> destruction <WH4103>: and he smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892>, both small <WH6996> and great <WH1419>, and they had emerods <WH2914> <WH8675> <WH6076> in their secret parts <WH8368> <WH8735>.

Therefore they sent <WH7971> <WH8762> the ark <WH727> of 'Elohim <WH430> to Ekron <WH6138>. And it came to pass, as the ark <WH727> of 'Elohim <WH430> came <WH935> <WH8800> to Ekron <WH6138>, that the Ekronites <WH6139> cried out <WH2199> <WH8799>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, They have brought about <WH5437> <WH8689> the ark <WH727> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> to us, to slay <WH4191> <WH8687> us and our people <WH5971>.

So they sent <WH7971> <WH8799> and gathered together <WH622> <WH8799> all the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Send away <WH7971> <WH8761> the ark <WH727> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and let it go again <WH7725> <WH8799> to his own place <WH4725>, that it slay <WH4191> <WH8686> us not, and our people <WH5971>: for there was a deadly <WH4194> destruction <WH4103> throughout all the city <WH5892>; the hand <WH3027> of 'Elohim <WH430> was very <WH3966> heavy <WH3513> <WH8804> there.

And the men <WH582> that died <WH4191> <WH8804> not were smitten <WH5221> <WH8717> with the emerods <WH2914> <WH8675> <WH6076>: and the cry <WH7775> of the city <WH5892> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> to heaven <WH8064>.
